snippet: Serge Ibaka, whose defense and steady scoring helped Oklahoma City reach the Western Conference finals, is expected to miss the rest of the playoffs after injuring his left calf Thursday.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka is expected to miss the rest of the NBA playoffs due to an injury in his left calf; Ibaka's defense and steady scoring have been an important part of team's success.
lead_paragraph: Serge Ibaka, whose defense and steady scoring helped Oklahoma City reach the Western Conference finals, is expected to miss the rest of the playoffs after injuring his left calf Thursday.

headline.main: Thunder’s Ibaka Is Probably Finished for Season With Calf Injury
headline.print_headline: Ibaka Is Probably Finished for Season With Calf Injury
